description:
Conan, Ran, Sonoko, and Okiya are invited to watch musician Hado`s rehearsal, but once they arrive, they are told by his manager Enjo that they cannot go inside. The group is shocked to learn from record company president Fuse that this will be Hado`s last concert. An argument erupts when reporter Kajiya suggests the name of Hado`s new song is also the name of his new girlfriend. Later, the fire department arrives to inspect the concert hall, where they find Hado hanging from the neck above the stage...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 裏切りのステージ (前編)
